title: Dia 1 Supp Main  > New acc smurf ; Anyone wanna Duo ? >EUW<
body:
Waddup,

as you see in the title...surprise, i'm looking for someone to Duo with. This low Elo Games are killing me for the inside and i fell like i gonna go insane if i don't get out of it asap. Long story Short, Main Elo Dia 1 > Masters and now playing active again [ Main Supp ] .I made a new acc.. now i wanna get back to Dia1 - masters asap. Since playing solo as a support in Gold / Plat mmr ( 9-1 Placements actually give u Gold 1 .. damn that's bad... ) is giving me Braindamage,  i'm looking for a jngler / Adc or whatever to Duo with. If u smurf  this mmr hit me up , hop on a ts with me and let's go. Pls dont be under 18.. and don't be stupid.I can teach ya a lil bit since i'm used to shotcall and understand the game pretty good and a lot of smart individuals (Insert Sarcasm here < ) appreciated my adivced and report me. Ay dont hit me up with the : "Hey im plat BUt im very gud only cuz team me bad u kno?"

Ay have a good one

IGN: ISupportProdigyI .. i dont know if these are i's or L's .. just copy it...

[Sorry for bad England ..my main language is not England..England is not my City]

replies.body: I canÂ´t add you somehow, because your name is to long for the riot system to add you :D
Hey, it seems like i found my double, add me, so we can talk a bit ^^.
